channel.title: Bug with serverstatus page?
channel.description:
i was trying to advertise my friends server, which i did in the past. i typed everything correctly, their were no duplicate's of the ip ect. when i press register, it says i can only post one sorry
it worked sucessfully 5 times before, but now it doesnt? does anyone know how i can post it?
[size=1pt]for anyone who wanted to know, it's bluerightscape.no-ip.info, if someone could post it up?[/size]

item.title: Bug with serverstatus page?
item.dc:creator: @iamthebest456 iamthebest456
item.description:
@iamthebest456 wrote:

WH1T3 B0W:

1. you can only post your own server there, dont post your friends. ;p

im posting my own…

item.title: Bug with serverstatus page?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

how can they tell if it’s my own?
if they were scanning my computer, that would be identity fraud it’s not my fault if i have personal documents on my computer, i go on safe websites
